ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Good news and Bard news...
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow long time since a post here. Yes we have instrument graphics - but they don t do anything!  New bug causes no instrument bonuses to any songs.  Let s hope
ygData.messageBody:
Wow long time since a post here.

Yes we have instrument graphics - but they don't do anything! New bug
causes no instrument bonuses to any songs. Let's hope for an emergency
patch for the emergency patch soon.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 09, 2002 6:37 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Good news and Bard news...

On the high side, news from the test server indicates long-awaited
instruments may be arriving soon on Norrath. Unfortunately, and more
currently, the most recent patch broke instrument bonuses for Bards across
the board.

Well, at least they're thinking about us...

Talies



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
